DOC.brief_summary: This study initiate investigate gastrointestinal tolerance new infant formula healthy , term , Asian infant .
DOC.brief_title: Gastrointestinal Tolerance Study New Infant Formula
DOC.criteria: Healthy , wellnourished , term , Asian infant ( gestational age ≥ 37 1/7 ≤ 41 6/7 week ) The mother unequivocally decide exclusively breastfeed Formula feed least one week , receive least two formula feeding per day Birth weight appropriate gestational age ( AGA ) , 25004000g Written inform consent parent ( ) and/or legal guardian , age ≥ 18 year . Age > 17 week Infants know current previous illnesses/conditions intervention could interfere study ( impact tolerance and/or growth ) , gastrointestinal malformation , chronic diarrhoea , malabsorptive syndrome , malnutrition , congenital immunodeficiency , major surgery , per investigator 's clinical judgement Infants suffer gastroenteritis diarrhoea last 4 week precede study start . Infants used medication nutritional supplement ( except vitamin supplementation complement breastfeed ) 4 week precede study start . Infants medical condition special diet standard ( non hydrolyse ) cow 's milkbased infant formula require ( cow 's milk allergy , soy protein allergy , fish protein allergy , egg protein allergy , lactose intolerance , galactosemia ) . Infants history current participation study involve investigational market product . Investigator 's uncertainty willingness ability parent comply protocol requirement .
